title: LET THE EARTH REJOICE AND SING

content: Let the earth rejoice and sing, Alleluia!
At the triumph of our King; Alleluia!
Who ascends from mortal sight, Alleluia!
Reigns now at our Father's right, Alleluia!
Christ who did upon a tree, Alleluia!
Christ who saved our fallen race, Alleluia!
Takes in heaven his rightful place, Alleluia!
Heaven and earth shall bend the knee, Alleluia!
On this day of victory; Alleluia!
Life has shattered evil's might, Alleluia!
Rising glorious in our sight, Alleluia!
Jesus, Victor, hear our prayer, Alleluia!
In your triumph let us share; Alleluia!
Lift our minds and hearts above, Alleluia!
Strengthen each one in your love, Alleluia!
